column1: If we’re going to end Mitch McConnell’s stranglehold on the Senate - & give @JoeBiden @KamalaHarris a Senate they can actually work with then we must #FliptheSenate.   The only way we can do that is by electing @ReverendWarnock @ossoff in GA on Jan. 5th ➡️https://t.co/4txy6kLmKl https://t.co/kHKTqxjuM4

To be clear: Ads are not the issue. The organic disinformation & misinformation running rampant on @Facebook’s platform is the problem.   Now this ads ban makes it harder to educate voters about the #GASen runoffs. https://t.co/kOq1PG8QI3
Congratulations @SusieLeeNV @StevenHorsford @dinatitus @AmodeiForNevada on their re-elections! Looking forward to continuing to fight alongside you all in Congress for Nevada’s working families.
Congratulations President-elect @joebiden and Vice President-elect @KamalaHarris! In record numbers Americans showed up to demand leadership decency and competence back in the White House.

Today is the day we’ve fought tirelessly to work toward since the day Donald Trump took office. We’re going to restore the soul of this nation by electing @joebiden & @kamalaharris - & then we’re going to #FlipTheSenate so we can truly make progress ⬇️⬇️ https://t.co/Ndf1BZZV4D

Tomorrow we need to make sure @PerkinsForLa is in the runoff so Democrats can pick up additional Senate seats after Election Day.  Will you join me in helping ensure we have the chance to send this veteran and proven leader to the US Senate? #LaSen https://t.co/Y92jq6wTke

Excited to join my friends @angelicamaria @Astrid_NV @NathalieRayes this afternoon to discuss what’s at stake for the Latino community in this election and how to support @JoeBiden @KamalaHarris  Sign up to join us at 4pm PT ⬇️⬇️  https://t.co/QHpbBlUPwS

Joined @RosenforNevada in voting early at the East Las Vegas Community Center! With only 16 days until Election Day it's critical we do whatever we can to reach every voter & work to ensure they vote for Democrats! Head over to https://t.co/jEWsDjcz3v to learn where you can vote https://t.co/fESg2mjCwJ

That’s right. So many things we care about - and the progress we’re able to make on those ideals - hinges on democrats flipping the Senate in November.   Looking forward to our conversation President @BarackObama! #FlipTheSenate https://t.co/3RZawTiiqp

The SCOTUS hearings have made it crystal clear that if we're going to protect our Supreme Court we need to #FlipTheSenate. But I'm not the only one who thinks Dems need to win in November so does @BarackObama. Join us both Friday as we discuss our plan! https://t.co/rFZSnYLHVx

Donald Trump is ramming through a Supreme Court nominee who will help him repeal the Affordable Care Act taking coverage away from millions of Americans in the middle of a pandemic. Repeal will lead to total chaos.  Make no mistake our health care is at stake on Election Day. https://t.co/iEnY5FIUPX

.@BarbaraBollier is polling neck & neck with her GOP opponent in #kssen race. And just last week Mitch McConnell's dark money super PAC dumped $7.2 million worth in ads attacking her. Why? Because he's panicking. He knows if we flip Kansas we will #FlipTheSenate  Let's do this! https://t.co/7nweIMPVkw
Looking forward to it! Join us tonight ⬇️ https://t.co/DvM2FbzZXm

I’m hopeful that the President and First Lady have a quick and full recovery from this virus. We must come together to get through this and the health and well-being of the President’s family and all of the White House staff will be in my thoughts.

Higher than ever @ChrisMurphyCT. I’m in.   Texas deserves a Senator who will fight for Texas families. They deserve a Senator who will listen to them. Not one who takes their marching orders from corporate special interests & McConnell. We need @mjhegar in the Senate. Join us ⬇️ https://t.co/FL42NVt8C7

Justice Ginsburg inspired us to fight for justice and equality. She showed women like me that we can break down barriers and claim our seat at the table.   But now the progress she fought so hard for is in danger. We must fight like hell to protect it ⬇️ https://t.co/9sqAt9yusw

America succeeds when Latinos have the opportunity to enter the middle class & achieve the American Dream. @JoeBiden @KamalaHarris understand & respect that.   Join me tomorrow at 5pm PT for a Latino Townhall as we discuss just that & more.   Sign up ⬇️⬇️ https://t.co/mjmhp4gX4r

Donald Trump spent the weekend in Nevada looking out for #1 - himself and his re-election recklessly putting Nevadans' health and safety at risk in the process.  50 days until Election Day. We've gotta make it count ⬇️ https://t.co/Hq3QgRNK7n

The men and women in uniform who sacrifice to serve our country are American heroes. They deserve our greatest respect - as do their families.  These comments disrespecting our troops are inexcusable. For a Commander-in-Chief they’re disqualifying. https://t.co/p034HVUv14

I'm proud to serve as Nevada's first woman in the US Senate & first Latina ever. This #WomensEqualityDay we know that the fight for equality continues. As we mark 100 years from the adoption of the 19th Amendment take time to make a plan to vote early.   Text VOTE to 30330 now.

Tonight I'll be joining @TomPerez @StevenHorsford @EdgarFloresNV for the last night of @nvdems @JoeForNV's #DemConvention pre-show! Join us as 5:15pm PT as we discuss why it's so critical we do whatever we can together to elect @JoeBiden. To register: https://t.co/tWxfnA6hsK

Can't wait for the country to see just what a star my friend @YvannaCancela is at the #DemConvention   Yvanna is the fighter Nevada families have on their side. With her help working to elect @JoeBiden together we're going to make sure NV & American families always come first https://t.co/inksv5ETJn

Joined my friends @CheriBustos @TomPerez today to discuss the hard work our teams @dscc @dccc @DNC are doing to help fight back against voter suppression & ensure every eligible voter can access the ballot this fall. And access the ballot safely & securely.   Take a look ⬇️⬇️⬇️ https://t.co/gtA0wH9Vzm

@dccc @CheriBustos @TomPerez @dscc @DNC Last night at the #DemConvention I made it clear that with Donald Trump & Mitch McConnell out of power Dems will expand access to the ballot & protect voting rights. But we must ensure in this election that anyone who’s eligible to vote can do so safely & without barriers.

@dccc @TomPerez @CheriBustos @dscc @DNC We're committed to expanding early vote for Americans. In NC we took on the GOP to protect the state’s early vote program so North Carolinians can vote the Saturday before Election Day - & won. We cannot allow anyone to make it harder for eligible voters to cast their ballots.

@dccc @CheriBustos @TomPerez @dscc @DNC .@CheriBustos @TomPerez & I have been working to protect the integrity of our elections. In GA we sued over the state's absentee ballot procedures b/c when those ballots are unfairly rejected voters are disenfranchised. We must ensure procedures to count those ballots are fair.

Mr. President: Nevada is not intimidated by you. America is not intimidated by you. We will send @JoeBiden to the WH & #FlipTheSenate   Trump & McConnell know how to divide but we know how to stand together. But to do it we need you on our side >> https://t.co/4txy6kLmKl

This fall some will vote in a voting booth with a mask on while many will choose to vote by mail. NV took the advice of scientists & medical experts - & listened to Nevadans - to put in place a vote by mail system. But Donald Trump seeks to divide us by undermining that right. https://t.co/IXWsaMV0j7
In just two short hours I will be going live at the 2020 #DemConvention!   Be sure to join me soon ➡️➡️➡️ https://t.co/iAdq2SO3zD https://t.co/acD2G37KUo

Tonight I will be LIVE at the Democratic National Convention with a message to the American people on the importance of voting safely & securely in this election. #DemConvention   Tune in tonight at 7:15pm PT/10:15pm ET: https://t.co/iAdq2SO3zD https://t.co/5BXWg8XTGg

NV did the right thing & expanded access to vote-by-mail. @realDonaldTrump has since attacked my state with outright lies & a meritless lawsuit.   Tonight at the @DemConvention I'll have a message for him: Nevada will not be intimidated by you.   WATCH >> https://t.co/iAdq2SO3zD

It’s unacceptable @USPS has to warn Americans their ballots may not be counted if they vote by mail. McConnell should end recess & work to pass emergency funding needed to provide urgent economic relief combat this pandemic & ensure @USPS can operate in a safe & timely manner. https://t.co/JoAwQddZl9

.@KamalaHarris is fearless intelligent and compassionate. I’ve known her since our AG days together and @JoeBiden hit a home run with Kamala.   I will work tirelessly with Joe and Kamala to win back the White House and flip the Senate. https://t.co/JXfyXHDRXx

Our diversity is our strength. @JoeBiden understands the importance of this fact because when our Latino Communities succeed - America succeeds. That's what this agenda is about - and I'm committed to fighting with Joe for all of these priorities for Latino families and workers. https://t.co/KR3xUKasuE

Unlike @realDonaldTrump Nevada understands - and respects - that voters deserve to vote safely and securely.  Mr. President Americans are dying. Less golfing and tweeting - and more work on testing. https://t.co/iMxTGp5h8H

This is a blatant lie. Nevada will not be intimidated by you Mr. President or let you work to suppress access to the ballot box.   I stand with @GovSisolak and Nevada’s state legislature in doing everything in our power to ensure every Nevada voter can vote easily and safely. https://t.co/zpt7TQkH1Q

Unlike our current president @JoeBiden understands that every policy issue is a women's issue and when women succeed - especially women of color - our country succeeds.   I look forward to fighting with Joe to make sure all women have a fair shot at success. https://t.co/vCPuIlwkx0

.@mjhegar is battle-tested and fiercely committed to delivering results for Texans - and is ready to win this race! As a decorated combat veteran and working mom MJ understands the challenges families across Texas are going through.   Join me in supporting MJ’s campaign today ⬇️ https://t.co/T5i3935ZuH

.@tmccnevada's manufacturing programs have helped transform Northern NV. That's what @JoeBiden's #BuildBackBetter plan will do - create jobs & transform communities.   RSVP to join a virtual tour w/ @DrBiden @dinatitus & me on Thursday 7/16 at 2:15pm >> https://t.co/BIHw7gWHLM

Mainers will have a champion in @SaraGideon. She stands up for what's right & will continue to build on her impressive record of fighting for Maine’s hardworking families.   We cannot defeat Mitch McConnell's majority unless we flip Maine blue #MESen ➡️ https://t.co/RGXxQAY5bc https://t.co/rvp9Wcos4Z

In the last 16 weeks nearly 50m Americans have filed for unemployment amid a pandemic that's wreaking havoc on our country. And what's @realdonaldtrump's answer to the American people? #FindSomethingNew.  Don't worry Mr. President—we will this November. #DumpTrump #DitchMitch

.@ReverendWarnock has shown that when there is a call to serve he answers with the moral clarity we need more of in Washington. I'm proud to endorse his campaign & look forward to working with him in the Senate. Join us today so we can make sure of it ➡️ https://t.co/vyIRdNycHC https://t.co/pfM4hLJH7i

Congrats Gov. @Hickenlooper on officially becoming the Dem nominee in CO's must-flip Senate seat! We need more Senators like John who will put politics aside to get things done. John's proven leadership underscores why Coloradans trust him & are ready to send him to the Senate! https://t.co/4WQXL7Gpc4

A fantastic team leading the charge to help @JoeBiden win NV! Congrats to @alanamounce @YvannaCancela @ShelbyWiltz! We know the road to the White House runs straight through NV - & that diversity is our strength. These three women will get the job done! https://t.co/gfd2BW7yuY

Thrilled @Nicole4Nevada’s nominated for @emilyslist’s Rising Star Award! As NV’s first woman ever elected as Majority Leader of the NV Senate Nicole’s a trailblazer who fights like hell for NV families. NV join me to help ensure she wins this & vote! ➡️ https://t.co/r3BwkWz6yL

.@nvdems is right. Hours-long wait times to vote is why I supported their lawsuit to expand vote by mail & the number of in-person polling locations. More must be done to prevent barriers to voting like this in November. And I hope the @NVSOS will work with us to help ensure it. https://t.co/jPZEBtusYm

Our country is at a turning point & now more than ever our response cannot be inaction. So many of you are wondering how you can make an impact. How about helping me #FlipTheSenate and end Mitch McConnell's majority?   Take action today to join me ➡️ https://t.co/Ff05y96qaf

My friend @DougJones is right. Alabama deserves better. Doug’s a man of honor who will continue to fight like hell for the people of Alabama. The Senate cannot afford to lose a strong independent voice like his. That’s why we all need to fight for Doug >>https://t.co/pxQpWf17SU https://t.co/ePYtBQ8ct2

.@realDonaldTrump perhaps you’ve moved on to bleach and it’s even further impairing your judgment. It’s clear Nevada is doing the right thing and your threat to withhold federal support especially during a pandemic is outrageous. https://t.co/tLU1c7kQOY

I've known @JoeBiden for a long time. His son Beau & I served as AGs together & were good friends. Joe knows what needs to be done so the focus in this country is on all of us & not just some. Joe's the right person to lead this country. And that's why I'm with Joe 100%. https://t.co/UzHRraBSDg

Conocí a @JoeBiden hace mucho. Su hijo Beau y yo fuimos procuradores generales al mismo tiempo y éramos buenos amigos. Joe sabe lo que se necesita hacer por nuestro país para que todos salgamos adelante. Joe es la persona adecuada para liderar este pais. Apoyo a Joe 100%.

Wishing a very happy birthday to @SarahMahler1 of the @WashoeDEMS today! Sarah thank you for your leadership and commitment to the Washoe Dems - and for always showing up when asked and even more so when you’re not. We are grateful to you and all of your hard work!

No Nevadan should be forced to choose between their wellbeing & their right to vote. I applaud @NVSOS for its expansion of Vote By Mail for June's primary election but more must be done to protect the integrity of our elections. @NVSOS should heed recommendations made by @nvdems https://t.co/dHEVlvTDIS

Saddened to learn of Sam Lieberman’s passing. Sam dedicated his life to NV working to strengthen higher education & ensure every Nevadan had the opportunity to succeed. And as @nvdems chair he gave everything to build our party into the success it is today. Sam will be missed.

Nevada has once again proven its importance this year because our state reflects the rest of the country. I look forward to Nevada continuing to shine as the first truly diverse state in our party’s nominating process. https://t.co/mYShPUCxis

I also agree with Chairman McCurdy that it’s time for us to start this conversation. The caucus process has real challenges and we could bring even more Nevadans into this process with a primary system. https://t.co/QbJB2BAC3q

I want to thank @WillMcCurdyII for his leadership and every @nvdems staff member and volunteer who worked tirelessly to help ensure we had another successful #FirstInTheWest caucus. With early voting more than 100000 Nevadans were able to participate in the process. Incredible!

Our #FirstInTheWest Caucus is here! As the 1st early state in the west to make our voices heard in selecting our next presidential nominee - & with an electorate that reflects the rich diversity of America - all eyes will be on us. Make your voice heard! https://t.co/EO0nJZGVt5

Met some fired up early voting caucus goers at Cardenas Market! Early voting is open until 8pm tonight at their 2545 S Eastern Ave location. If you’re a Nevada Dem still need to vote and nearby- please come vote to ensure your voice is heard in this election! #FirstInTheWest https://t.co/QRvckL1ilY

Nevada Democrats! Today is the LAST day to vote early in our #FirstInTheWest Caucus!   We’ve seen such incredible enthusiasm and turnout across the state during early vote. Now let’s make today no different!   Find an early voting site near you ➡️➡️ https://t.co/zlREp5a4PF

Incredible! If you’re a Nevada Democrat that’s ready to make your voice heard in this election - and help us kick Donald Trump out of office - please make a plan to vote early in our #FirstInTheWest Caucus! Early voting goes through Tuesday 2/18 ➡️➡️ https://t.co/zlREp5a4PF https://t.co/0NpjUfrCpi

NV’s 3rd day of early voting kicks off today! @nvdems worked tirelessly to ensure our #FirstInTheWest is the most accessible yet & Dems are energized across NV in this election! Now let’s turn that energy into action. Find an early voting site near you ➡️https://t.co/zlREp5a4PF https://t.co/mC8GLJXtFl

Do you want to hear from @JoeBiden and @ewarren about the issues that matter most to you in this election like health care or climate change? Register to attend @CNN’s Presidential Town Hall on Thursday 2/20 in Las Vegas and hear from them in-person! ➡️ https://t.co/Fw3LxUOWmh

I kicked off early voting in Nevada @Culinary226 yesterday with fired up Democrats ready to make their voices heard!   Early voting for our #FirstInTheWest Caucus lasts through Tuesday 2/18. If you haven’t made a plan to vote early yet do so today ➡️ https://t.co/zlREp5a4PF https://t.co/BnIrhJMc8j

Do you want to hear from @BernieSanders @PeteButtigieg @amyklobuchar about the issues that matter most to you like health care or climate change? Register to attend @CNN’s Presidential Town Hall on Tuesday 2/18 in Las Vegas to do just that —>> https://t.co/zg3ILB13Nt
